column3: and well run.  A typical Lettuce Entertain You take on the Tapas restuarant.  Kind of on the pricey side
column4: but food is good and on the bigger side
column5: they suggest maybe 2-3 plates per person
column7: and I am known to be a prodigeous eater.  Everything I had was good
column12: ham plate.  This location is in the middle of Lincoln Park
column13: and has the crowd you'd expect.  The place is quite large
column14: and service is nice and quick.  Parking is nightmarish on busy weekend nights.  Good place for groups.
